U

unidue.ub.statistics - package unidue.ub.statistics
Contains several tools for analysis.
unidue.ub.statistics.admin - package unidue.ub.statistics.admin
Contains several tools for administering users and general settings of the library system (systamtics, places, collections etc.)
unidue.ub.statistics.alephConnector - package unidue.ub.statistics.alephConnector
Contains the Aleph specific statements and properties.
unidue.ub.statistics.alert - package unidue.ub.statistics.alert
Contains tools for for alerting services and digest readers for example for requests hitlists
unidue.ub.statistics.analysis - package unidue.ub.statistics.analysis
Containes the major analyzing mechanisms.
unidue.ub.statistics.blacklist - package unidue.ub.statistics.blacklist
Managing items and books excluded from analysis
unidue.ub.statistics.csvHandling - package unidue.ub.statistics.csvHandling
Contains the servlets handling the upload deletion and evaluation of csv files.
unidue.ub.statistics.eUsage - package unidue.ub.statistics.eUsage
Handling and evaluation of COUNTER Report for the usage of electronic media.
unidue.ub.statistics.eUsage.sushi - package unidue.ub.statistics.eUsage.sushi
Inclusion of SUSHI based COUNTER statistics and several tools around journal usage
unidue.ub.statistics.frontend - package unidue.ub.statistics.frontend
Contains the servlets responsible for the user interactions.
unidue.ub.statistics.help - package unidue.ub.statistics.help
Displays the XML based help files
unidue.ub.statistics.media.journal - package unidue.ub.statistics.media.journal
Representation of journal information and their aggregation in collections.
unidue.ub.statistics.media.monographs - package unidue.ub.statistics.media.monographs
Representation of bibliographic information according to FRBR and of events connected to the individual items
unidue.ub.statistics.resolver - package unidue.ub.statistics.resolver
Several resolvers to include external information from external sources
unidue.ub.statistics.scheduler - package unidue.ub.statistics.scheduler
Contains scheduler for periodic services.
unidue.ub.statistics.series - package unidue.ub.statistics.series
Grouping of events and transformation in JSON object for display.
unidue.ub.statistics.stock - package unidue.ub.statistics.stock
Analysis and evaluation of stock related properties.
unidue.ub.statistics.stockcontrol - package unidue.ub.statistics.stockcontrol
Central definition and handling of parameters for stock control.
unidue.ub.statistics.userauth - package unidue.ub.statistics.userauth
Handling of users and their personal options.
